Package io.micronaut.context

Class AbstractBeanResolutionContext

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.context.AbstractBeanResolutionContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
BeanResolutionContext, ValueResolver<CharSequence>, AutoCloseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultBeanResolutionContext
@Internal public abstract class AbstractBeanResolutionContext extends Object implements BeanResolutionContext
Default implementation of the BeanResolutionContext interface.
Since:
1.2.3
Author:
Graeme Rocher
